title: Snoopy Around the World: Howl-O-Ween at HarbourFront
blurb: Travel the world with Snoopy at HarbourFront Centre!
description: Celebrate Halloween, Christmas and Chinese New Year with Snoopy as he travels around the world at HarbourFront Centre! Kickstart Snoopy's epic world adventure with Halloween as the Peanuts gang take you on a spooky journey filled with thrills, giggles, and delightful surprises! Look forward to a Halloween-Themed Experience Centre for the spooky season. Shoppers who spend a minimum amount can participate in a Grand Draw to win a Honda Freed. There is also the 1st Snoopy Experience Centre in Singapore at Level 11 with an immersive Snoopy universe creating unforgettable family memories!
Keyword_tag: Snoopy, Halloween, Christmas, Chinese New Year, family-friendly, HarbourFront Centre, experience centre, play park
